name: Border Officer
description: Usually everyone is unemployed here. But by chance you got a job. You'il work for the state.Everyone in your family is sick or unemployed, only you can help them. You're an immigrant officer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
